full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: RFP - Design and Construct STTC Main Operating Base - East**

**Reference Number:** HQ0107DC_81750

**Publication Date:** May 6, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** July 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

**Introduction:**

The Department of National Defence, through Defence Construction Canada, is soliciting proposals from Design-Build Teams to design and construct the STTC Main Operating Base - East at 8 Wing Trenton, Ontario. This project follows a modified design-build approach, with additional details provided in the Request for Proposals (RFP) documents.

**Project Overview:**

The estimated project cost is in the range of $430,000,000. Bidders are invited to submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the tender closing date. This solicitation is being conducted in accordance with the requirements set out in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Chapter Nineteen of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

**Key Details:**

* RFP documents are available on the MERX website: http://www.merx.com
* Questions regarding this solicitation should be directed to the point of contact identified in this advertisement
* Bidders can expect payment details to be made public on the Defence Construction Canada website
* Final contract award results will be available on the Defence Construction Canada website

**Required Rates:**

* Hourly rates for various professional positions, such as architects, engineers, and project managers, are listed in the RFP documents

**Eligibility:**

* Firms that consider themselves qualified to provide these services are invited to submit their proposals

**Merx Website:**

* Bidders can submit an offer and access the documents on http://www.merx.com
* Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information
